text: I think when it comes to that 30 thing
I'm more mad at the industry and people
than I am at Apple and I feel like
that's a hot take maybe it's an
unpopular opinion oh but like when when
the iPhone first came out and Steve Jobs
was like we're gonna use HTML5 for
everything and everybody was like no go
f yourself uh you're gonna build us an
app store and like give us native apps
and then they did and then like 10 years
later everybody's like hey why are you
charging so much money for this thing
that we force you to build and put a lot
of money into that's not fair we want
something that's open and it's just like
that you could have had it if you had
just all worked together and tried but
you didn't want to so you can now like
sleep in the bed that you made thank you
yeah you tell them people don't like
that yeah I mean in their defense a lot
of people complaining now probably
weren't involved in the original
decisions yeah but that's not how like
you gotta you gotta pay for the mistakes
of the past like that's what we all got
to do that's just life
[Music]
